data.title: How to think about weird things

data.title: Imperium
data.review: This was the first Robert Harris novel I read. Growing up I had always thought of Ancient Rome as boring - memorizing a bunch of emperors names and dates and locations where battles took place. However this book was anything but boring.
data.author: Robert Harris
